lines.text: Betting on a horse isn't the quickest way to lose money ~~ But it's the surest.
The Gang ~ They have established a big business on borrowed capital ~ somebody loaned them fifty cents ~
Jack ~ Some neighbors say he'll be hanged when he grows up ~ Others hope it will happen sooner ~
The lemonade is great! Nobody'll ever know the pup fell in it ~
Sing Joy ~~ Popular with the gang ~~ They can all lick him ~~
The Horse Owner ~ He's not exactly dishonest ~ But is broadminded on the subject ~~
Talk Inglish ~ Ah don't understand chop sooey!
Derby Day ~ When a small boy gets a "great idea" there's only one safe thing for the neighbors to do ~ Move out ~
